document.full_text: the nfl asked a federal court on monday to keep its lockout against players in place while the national labor relations board (nlrb) rules on an owners' complaint against the players' union.
document.title: league asks court to keep lockout in place
lines_and_colors: the nfl asked a federal court on monday to keep its lockout against players in place while the national labor relations board (nlrb) rules on an owners' complaint against the players' union.
